questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a warehouse
D) In a residential area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A bird perched inside a building
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The background scenery
B) The bird perched on a box
C) The people in the photo
D) The artwork on the wall

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person
C) A bird
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A cityscape
B) Trees and flowers
C) Industrial pipes and walls
D) A beach

A) A table
B) A bird perched on a green box
C) A car
D) A person

A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

B) Metal
C) Plastic
D) Glass

C) Drinking water
D) Eating food

B) Dark brown or black

B) Plastic
